mapper.insert: insert into category(name, `desc`, blog_no, is_default) values(#{name}, #{desc}, #{blogNo}, #{isDefault})
mapper.update: update category set name=#{name}, `desc` = #{desc}, is_default=#{isDefault} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no, name, `desc`, is_default, blog_no, (select count(*) from post where category_no = category.no) as postCount from category where blog_no = (select no from user where id = #{blogId})
select category.name, count(*) as postCnt from post join category on post.category_no = category.no where blog_no = #{blogNo} group by category.no
